items.sentence: The Jacksons are coming over for dinner this evening.
Tom tried to convince Mary to drop her hunger strike.
Tom often falls asleep while watching baseball on TV.
Tom started playing the trumpet when he was thirteen.
No one was interested in what Tom was trying to sell.
I've been living in Australia for nearly three years.
Can someone translate this letter into French for me?
I suppose Tom would've been about sixty when he died.
Tom didn't notice the look of disdain on Mary's face.
Tom says he's hoping we can all go swimming tomorrow.
Tom said he wished that you wouldn't do that anymore.
Tom told me he didn't want to come home empty-handed.
Tom asked me if I'd like to go to Australia with him.
Are you going to take part in tomorrow's celebration?
I'm wondering whether I should ask Mary to the dance.
That isn't something I want to think about right now.
While I was talking on the phone, she came to see me.
The other day her mother passed away in the hospital.
I found that I couldn't study well with the radio on.
I always make a point of painting things as they are.
